projects.name: LineageOS
projects.description: Maintained ports for various devices, including the Galaxy S4 and Redmi 3S. Worked on custom features like the touchscreen gestures system. Brought up various features from older versions to newer versions.

projects.name: Xmas and Friends
projects.tagline: a Unity mobile game for learning Chinese
projects.description: A team project for a national inter-school competition, in which we achieved the top prize. Inspired by Monument Valley.

projects.name: Optical Localisation of Robots
projects.description: A team project for the NUS Hack&Roll 2018 hackathon. Optically localized a sensor-less robot in a robotics play field via a camera with a bird's-eye view and a server that updates the robots of their positions.

projects.name: Enhanced Ant Colony Optimization in Networks
projects.description: A team project. Applied ant colony optimization techniques in enhancing network throughput in a modelled network. Built an interface for visualizing network performance.

projects.name: Flash cards
projects.description: Made to aid myself in my revisions for the GCE A-level examination.
